name: Geode
subtitle: Offically on iOS
description: Geode has come to iOS and iPadOS!

versions.localizedDescription:
## Changelog
- Added **Trans** icon
- Made launching with JIT-less much more quicker (reducing signing & patching)
- Added a JIT-less diagnose view
- Removed the requirement of mobile provision file when importing certificate (p12 file is now only needed)
- Fixed iOS 26 beta 2 from crashing upon launch (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/57)
- Fixed safe mode not only patching with Geode and instead patching with other mods
- Fixed mods sometimes not patching unless the game is relaunched

View the [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/blob/main/INSTALL.md) guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

## Changelog
- Added experimental JIT-less support!
- Fixed issue with automatic launching automatically launching in TIPA version if you go back to the app.

View the [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/blob/main/INSTALL.md) guide on installing. It will be updated in the future for a guide on JIT-less.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v1.0.1...v1.1.0

## Changelog
- Fixed StikJIT and other apps not opening automatically when pressing launch

View the [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/blob/main/INSTALL.md) guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

Finally at **v1.0.0**! This adds a new icon to celebrate Pride Month, fixes bugs, and more!

## Changelog
- Added icon selection
- Added **Pride Month** icon
- Added a warning if you launch Geode with JIT without having it launch in the containerized Geometry Dash (Mainly for those that think they need to **always** launch Geode with JIT when that isn't the case) (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/35)
- Fixed bug with JIT enabler crashing on iPad when tapped on (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/37)
- Fixed bug with the launcher not knowing if Geode dylib is up to date or not (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/36)
- Fixed bug with not being able to exit settings if you're on landscape rotation in iPhone (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/47)
- Fixed Trollstore version of the launcher not rendering color wheel (uses image instead)
- Fixed issue with color selection being impossible to exit on iPad

View the [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/blob/main/INSTALL.md) guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.5.1...v1.0.0

## Changelog
- Added Trollstore warning to tell you to enable "URL Scheme" in settings
- Removed Nightly being enabled by default
- Added landscape rotation support for phones
- Fixed bug where cancelling the update early for Geode will assume Geode was updated for nightly releases
- Fixed Trollstore version of the launcher crashing when going to color picker

**Expect bugs!**

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: A mod you are using is requesting this permission.

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This permission is needed for accessing the JIT server.

news.title: Geode is on iOS!
news.caption: Geode has come to iOS on SideStore!

news.title: Hello Soggy Mod Users!
news.caption: You may have noticed that our name has changed and our logo is more vibrant than usual. To celebrate the pride year, we have changed our logo and name to be gayer than ever before. Thank you for your understanding, stay modding!

news.title: Updates v1.1.0 and v1.2.0!
news.caption: Hello, everyone now there is support for jitless (experimental), this also comes in handy for iOS/iPadOS 26 as Apple patched the StikJIT/StikDebug JIT
